text: Equilibrium is the sixth studio album by American sludge metal band Crowbar, released in March 2000. It was original bassist Todd Strange's final album with the band. ==Track listing== # I Feel the Burning Sun – 3:37 # Equilibrium – 4:40 # Glass Full of Liquid Pain – 3:28 # Command of Myself – 3:16 # Down Into the Rotting Earth – 5:16 # To Touch the Hand of God – 5:06 # Uncovering – 4:21 # Buried Once Again – 4:04 # Things You Can't Understand – 3:28 # Euphoria Minus One – 3:24 # Dream Weaver (Gary Wright cover) – 8:51 # In a Gadda da Vida (Iron Butterfly cover - hidden track, a cappella) – 1:09 ==Personnel== *Kirk Windstein – vocals, guitars *Sammy Pierre Duet – guitars *Todd Strange – bass *Sid Montz – drums ==Music videos== *"I Feel the Burning Sun" ==References== Category:2000 albums Category:Crowbar (American band) albums
title: Equilibrium (Crowbar album)
